alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Hyde; Martin; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 10:29PM EDT until July 06 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1029 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westover to near Hinson to near Pactolus, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Plymouth, Belhaven, Ponzer, Pinetown, Pungo, Columbia, Woodley, Wenona, Hinson, Bayview, Bunyan, Pike Road, Leechville, Sidney Crossroads, Westover, Pleasant Grove, Terra Ceia, Scuppernong and Yeatesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
